code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import{getFromStorage}from'./helper/localStorage';import{themeReducer}from'./theme/themeReducers';import rootSaga from'./rootSaga';var reducer=combineReducers({themeToggle:themeReducer});var themeFromStorage=getFromStorage('theme')||false;var initialState={themeToggle:{theme:themeFromStorage}};var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(reducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
